name: Citizen
description: No ability at night just you can vote.

name: Invulnerable
description: coming soon

name: Traitor
description: coming soon

name: Student
description: coming soon

name: Detective
description: You will know if your target is suspicious, except for the Godfather.

name: Lookout
description: Watch one person at night to see who visits them.

name: Tracker
description: Track one person at night to see who they visit.

name: Autopsist
description: coming soon

name: Mason
description: coming soon

name: Sniper
description: If your target is attacked, both you and your attacker will die instead. If you successfully protect someone, you can't be saved from death. Your counterattack ignores night immunity.

name: Veteran
description: While on alert you can not be killed at night. If anyone visits you while you are on alert they will be shot. You can only go on alert 3 times. You are immune to role blocks.

name: Jailor
description: You may anonymously talk with your prisoner.  You may choose to execute your prisoner. The jailed target cannot perform their night ability. While jailed the prisoner is safe from all attacks.

name: Gunsmith
description: coming soon

name: VampireHunter
description: If you find a Vampire you will stake them in the heart. If a Vampire visits you they will be staked. You can hear Vampires at night.If you kill all Vampires you will become a Vigilante.

name: Doctor
description: You may only heal yourself once. You will know if your target is attacked.

name: Hero
description: coming soon

name: Bodyguard
description: You will know if your target is suspicious, except for the Godfather.

name: Crusader
description: Grant your target Powerful defense. You will know if your target is attacked. You attack one person who visits your target on the same night. You do not attack vampires, but you do block their attacks. You will know if your target is attacked.

name: Trapper
description: Traps take one day to build. Traps can be torn down by selecting yourself at night. You may only have one Trap out at a time.

name: Reflector
description: coming soon

name: Priest
description: coming soon

name: Escort
description: Distraction blocks your target from using their role's night ability. You are immune to role blocks. If you target a Serial Killer, they will attack you.

name: Mayor
description: Once you have revealed yourself as the Mayor your vote counts as 3 votes. You may not be healed once you have revealed. Once revealed you can't whisper, or be whispered to.

name: Retributionist
description: Create zombies from dead true-hearted Town players. Use their abilities on your second target. Each zombie can be used once before it rots.

name: Judge
description: coming soon

name: Conjurer
description: coming soon
